documentation.text:
@title Royalties for Non-Fungible Tokens
 @dev Contract for the split between community royalties and dev royalties
@dev set royalties address (weth)
@dev set creator address, can be another contract
@dev set collection address, can be another contract
@dev set only smaller collection size, can't increase size
@dev set creator royalties
@dev set creator royalties

@dev get total royalties
 @return total royalties

@dev get total collected
 @return total collected

@dev get creator balance
 @return creator total balance

@dev get single token total royalties
 @return single token royalties

@dev get single token balance
 @return single token balance
@dev get token balances for each token from an array of tokenIDs

@dev get address tot claims
 @return address total claims
@dev claim community royalties per token id
@dev claim community from an array of tokenIDs
@dev claim creator royalties

@title Royalties for Non-Fungible Tokens
 @dev Contract for the split between community royalties and dev royalties
@dev set royalties address (weth)
@dev set creator address, can be another contract
@dev set collection address, can be another contract
@dev set only smaller collection size, can't increase size
@dev set creator royalties
@dev set creator royalties

@dev get total royalties
 @return total royalties

@dev get total collected
 @return total collected

@dev get creator balance
 @return creator total balance

@dev get single token total royalties
 @return single token royalties

@dev get single token balance
 @return single token balance
@dev get token balances for each token from an array of tokenIDs

@dev get address tot claims
 @return address total claims
@dev claim community royalties per token id
@dev claim community from an array of tokenIDs
@dev claim creator royalties

devdoc.details: Contract for the split between community royalties and dev royalties

claimCommunity(uint256).details: claim community royalties per token id

claimCommunityBatch(uint256[]).details: claim community from an array of tokenIDs

getTokensBalance(uint256[]).details: get token balances for each token from an array of tokenIDs

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCollectionAddress(address).details: set collection address, can be another contract

setCollectionSize(uint256).details: set only smaller collection size, can't increase size

setCreatorAddress(address).details: set creator address, can be another contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Royalties for Non-Fungible Tokens
